org.lenskit.util.table.writer

Class AbstractTableWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.util.table.writer.AbstractTableWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, TableWriter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSVWriter, TableBuilder

    public abstract class AbstractTableWriter
extends Object
implements TableWriter

    Abstract helper class for implementing table writers.

    Since:
    1.1

    • Method Detail

      • writeRow

        public void writeRow(Object... row)
              throws IOException

        Write a row to the table. This method is thread-safe.

        This implementation delegates to TableWriter.writeRow(java.util.List).

        Specified by:
        writeRow in interface TableWriter
        Parameters:
        row - A row of values. If the table requires more columns, the remaining columns are empty. The row is copied if necessary; the caller is free to re-use the same array for returnValue calls.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs writing the row.

      • checkRowWidth

        protected void checkRowWidth(int width)

        Check the width of a row to see if it is too wide. This formats the exception with a helpful error message.

        Parameters:
        width - The row width.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the row is too wide.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException

        No-op close implementaiton.

        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface TableWriter
        Throws:
        IOException
